team_quests.title: Jetpack Joyride
team_quests.description: Everyone must bring a jumppack or hower pack! Work together to complete the mission while airborne. The floor is lava!

team_quests.title: Old School
team_quests.description: Restricted loadout challenge! Only use the Constitution primary and support weapons are restricted to worldwar 2 era firearms.

team_quests.title: Pacifist
team_quests.description: Complete the mission with minimal casualties. Extract with as few kills as possible (or none at all). Perfect for peaceful operators competing for score!

team_quests.title: Danger is my Middle Name
team_quests.description: All stratagems, grenades, and throwables can ONLY be called/thrown at your own feet or in front of you. Friendly fire ... isn't!

team_quests.title: Protect the President
team_quests.description: One soldier fights in light armor with only a pistol - the President. The rest must complete the mission while keeping the President alive. They cannot take any casualties!
